item.title: Top Ten Tips: SDS for Substance Misuse Providers
item.description:
Who is it for? 
The SDS for Substance Misuse Providers is for service providers in the statutory, voluntary and private sectors preparing their organisations to offer self-directed support services.
What does it do? 

The SDS for Substance Misuse Providers sets out ten top tips for self-directed support implementation

How can you use it? 
The SDS for Substance Misuse Providers can be used by service providers to assess what they need to do to prepare for self-directed support. It can be used to draw up an action plan for implementation. It can also be used to assess progress.
